participant_1.background:
My mother lives with me.
I like to plant flowers in my gardens.
I like to take my dog for long walks.
I have a lizard named nagini.
I enjoy cooking for people.

participant_2.background:
I m applying for publishing jobs.
The only autographs i ve ever wanted are from authors.
I used to wear glasses as a child.
My mother is a librarian.
My favorite color is green.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read books, and I'm applying for publishing jobs.
That's great! I also love to read. What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but my favorite genre is fantasy.
Me too! I love the world building in fantasy books.
Me too! I love getting lost in a different world.
I also like to cook for people. What are your favorite foods to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. I'm not very good at cooking other things, but I'm a pro at pasta.
I love pasta too! I'm not very good at cooking it, but I love eating it.
We should cook together sometime! I'll teach you how to make some of my favorite pasta dishes.
That would be great! I love learning new things.
Me too! I love learning about new cultures and different ways to cook.
I think we'll get along great. We seem to have a lot in common.
I think so too! I'm glad I met you.
